00073     struct ActiveSet
00074     {
00075       int num_equal;
00076       double true_active_value;
00077       std::vector<int> active_ind;
00078       
00079       void set( int index )
00080       {
00081         active_ind.clear();
00082         active_ind.push_back(index);
00083         num_equal = 0;
00084       }
00085       void add( int index, bool equal )
00086       {
00087         active_ind.push_back(index);
00088         num_equal += equal;
00089       }
00090     };
00091 
00092     class SymmetricMatrix
00093     {
00094       double* storage;
00095       size_t size;
00096       size_t index(size_t r, size_t c) const
00097         { return (r <= c) ? size*r - r*(r+1)/2+c : size*c - c*(c+1)/2+r; }
00098       
00099       public:
00100       
00101       SymmetricMatrix() : storage(0), size(0) {}
00102       
00103       ~SymmetricMatrix() { free(storage); }
00104       
00105       void resize( size_t new_size ) {
00106         size = new_size;
00107         storage = (double*)realloc( storage, sizeof(double) * size * (size+1) / 2 );
00108       }
00109       
00110       void fill( double value ) {
00111         std::fill( storage, storage + (size * (size+1) / 2), value );
00112       }
00113       
00114       double& operator()(size_t r, size_t c)
00115         { return storage[index(r,c)]; }
00116         
00117       double operator()(size_t r, size_t c) const
00118         { return storage[index(r,c)]; }
00119         
00120       double condition3x3() const;
00121     };

00253 
00254 inline void NonSmoothDescent::find_plane_normal( const Vector3D& pt1,
00255                                                  const Vector3D& pt2,
00256                                                  const Vector3D& pt3,
00257                                                  Vector3D& cross,
00258                                                  MsqError &/*err*/ )
00259 {
00260   Vector3D vecA = pt2 - pt1;
00261   Vector3D vecB = pt3 - pt1;
00262   cross = vecA * vecB;
00263   cross /= cross.length();
00264 }
00265 
00266 inline bool NonSmoothDescent::improvement_check(MsqError &/*err*/)
00267 {
00268   /* check to see that the mesh didn't get worse */
00269   if (originalValue < mActive.true_active_value) {
00270      MSQ_PRINT(2)("The local mesh got worse; initial value %f; final value %f\n",
00271                originalValue,  mActive.true_active_value );
00272        return false;
00273    }
00274 
00275   return true;
00276 }
